abstract: Gas prices are spiking. An owner talks about growing without debt. How to compete with Google. Have you ever hired an English major?
snippet: Gas prices are spiking. An owner talks about growing without debt. How to compete with Google. Have you ever hired an English major?
lead_paragraph: With Gene Marks on vacation, we present a truncated version of his usual roundup of articles that small-business owners should be reading. Gene will return next week.

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Hire an English Major
